entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sundre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sundre Airport 02:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -26.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
